Title: Not So Simple Sentence 1: The task seemed like an easy one. Sentence 2: It would only take a few moments and was simple to do. Sentence 3: The task had to be done with another worker connected online. Sentence 4: The task took too long due to the other worker and was abandoned. Sentence 5: The connection was made quickly but the other worker never answered.

Title: No Fun at the Party Sentence 1: Her friends didn't want to leave. Sentence 2: She wasn't having fun and wanted to leave. Sentence 3: Rachel let her friends know she was ready. Sentence 4: Rachel had gone to a party with her friends. Sentence 5: Rachel left without her friends.

Title: My flight. Sentence 1: I boarded a flight to Minnesota from Florida very nervously. Sentence 2: After about an hour I became very calm and everything was fine. Sentence 3: As the plane took off I was very shaky and nervous. Sentence 4: I'm not a fan of flying but I had to do it. Sentence 5: When the plane landed I was completely fine and not nervous at all.

Title: Large Oak Sentence 1: My grandma joined a contest in her small hometown. Sentence 2: She ended up winning the contest, and a check for $100. Sentence 3: Her tree was humongous, and very old. Sentence 4: She believed she had the biggest tree, and wanted to win. Sentence 5: A picture was posted in the paper of her holding her check.

Title: Bit Sentence 1: My foot has been itching badly since I got that mosquito bite. Sentence 2: The ointment I put on it didn't really help much. Sentence 3: The mosquito bit me on the bottom of my foot. Sentence 4: I have been scratching the bite all day long since I got it. Sentence 5: Tomorrow, I'll try putting a hot towel on it to decrease the swelling.

Title: Produce Sentence 1: Anna loved fresh veggies, but she was on a tight budget. Sentence 2: It was free - and it was delicious! Sentence 3: Then she had the idea to plant a garden. Sentence 4: In a few months she had her own homegrown produce. Sentence 5: Sadly, veggies were not really affordable.

Title: The Dead Battery Sentence 1: It wouldn't crank up. Sentence 2: Landon went to start his car. Sentence 3: Landon noticed his lights were accidently left on. Sentence 4: He realized his battery was dead. Sentence 5: Landon got a charger to charge up his battery.
